overview:
George is a native Londoner and has enjoyed success in the City as the owner of AboutThisVan. He lives and works in the London, Hertfordshire and Essex area.

After being a driver of vans for van and a man services for many years, George set-up his own company in 2001. The main aim of this firm was to provide the best quality commercial and residential van services.

George has been recognised by many leading firms as the preferred choice for small business removalists, and has maintained relationships with local clients for many years.
